headline: Lou Guzzi: The Simple Range Session

page_title: Lou Guzzi: The Simple Range Session
slug: Lou Guzzi: The Simple Range Session
body: A practice session doesn't have to include longer clubs to be productive -- especially if it's early in the morning or after a long day at work. Hit some smooth sand wedges to a general target until you feel sharp, as demonstrated by Top 100 Teacher Lou Guzzi.
